title: my main account got hacked

replies.body: What if I do not remember my E-Mail I had with the account though??
You'll probably still be able to recover the account, you'll just have to provide everything else they request of you.

Hey there,

You'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding your account in order to begin the account recovery process.
